    H

    heartbeat() - Method in class com.audiostreaming.Server
    Periodic maintenance task that: Marks clients DISCONNECTED after a timeout with no UDP packets Removes long-disconnected clients after a grace period Sends a lightweight heartbeat over TCP to detect closed client sockets

    P

    processPacket(byte[], InetAddress, int) - Method in class com.audiostreaming.Server
    Processes a single UDP audio packet: performs basic validation, updates sequencing, buffers in-order frames, and forwards them to other eligible clients.

    Server - Class in com.audiostreaming
    Audio streaming server that forwards UDP audio frames between clients and maintains a TCP control channel for registration, presence, and commands such as JOIN, LEAVE, MUTE, and UNMUTE.
    Server(DatagramSocket) - Constructor for class com.audiostreaming.Server
    Creates a server instance bound to the provided UDP socket.

    Starts the TCP control server, binding to port 4444 by default.
    startTCPServer(ServerSocket) - Method in class com.audiostreaming.Server

    stop() - Method in class com.audiostreaming.Server
    Stops the server, closing TCP and UDP sockets, terminating background tasks, and clearing client state/mappings.
    stopReceiving() - Method in class com.audiostreaming.AudioHandler
    Stops the receiving and playback threads, closes audio resources, and closes the socket.
    stopStreaming() - Method in class com.audiostreaming.AudioHandler
    Stops the audio streaming thread and waits for it to terminate.
